name: Add similar words for a new record with the word to Google sheets
description:
Every time a new row with a word is added to your Google Sheets spreadsheet, Make will automatically get a list of similar words and update a row with this word in Google Sheets.
The template uses thisÂ [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/18ZVzRIrXjfiqwML6_6XDzPQz75LyBtgjATVvXPQCj_Q/edit?usp=sharing).
